content:
Hi everybody,
I am Nga Ngo, from Thang Long University in Hanoi, Vietnam. I have been studying lean to formal some theorems several months. Nice to be friend with all of you.
Welcome to Zulip! If you have any questions. Just ask! It's the way we've all learned Lean. (Except for some frienly wizards, who seem to have known Lean before it was invented.)
Hello again, it's nice to hear you are still working with lean

Welcome to Zulip! If you have any questions. Just ask! It's the way we've all learned Lean. (Except for some frienly wizards, who seem to have known Lean before it was invented.)

Thanks, I will ask maybe many stupid questions because I got many problems when I tried to deal with R^n

Hello again, it's nice to hear you are still working with lean

Hi, hope to see you again in Quy Nhon in June. Will you take part in The Vietnam-America conference?
I don't know, but I haven't planned on it. I guess Tom Hales will be there?

I don't know, but I haven't planned on it. I guess Tom Hales will be there?

As I know, he will. And I hope you will be there, too.
hi again! i will also be there
I am very glad to hear that, Jesse.
